articles.description: Gordon Ramsay and his family are believed to have moved into a luxury apartment in London last year, with their relocation said to have been whilst renovation work on their home was underway
articles.content:
Gordon Ramsay and his family are said to have moved into a luxury apartment in London last year whilst renovation work was underway of their home. 
 The celebrity chef, 56, and his wife Tana Ramsay,… [+3073 chars]
